attributes.action: Make it law that a child can access a nhs dentist for checkups and treatment
attributes.additional_details: Employ dentists to deal with the dental health of children for free.
attributes.background: There are less nhs dentists now and many children are now not seeing a dentist. Parents cannot afford private dentistry. Make it law that if a child has no nhs dentist then a dentist will be made available for that child to get dental checkups and treatment for free.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625518
